summary.content: After reading a post over at Eric Meyer’s site about the Snoop Dogg Shizzolator, I figured I had to try it out. It’s been a long time since I’ve seen something as funny as this on the internet (besides Ebaum’s Epilepsy Test). I thought it was so funny, that I saved a “Shizzolated” copy of my article “Play By The Rules”. Here’s a snippet: Yo’ a** don’t throw a baseball down da field fo’ a 50-yard touchdown n’ sh**. Yo’ a** don’t kick a basketball past a goalie score a point n’ sh**.

content.html:
After reading a post over at Eric Meyer’s site about the Snoop Dogg Shizzolator, I figured I had to try it out.

It’s been a long time since I’ve seen something as funny as this on the internet (besides Ebaum’s Epilepsy Test). I thought it was so funny, that I saved a “Shizzolated” copy of my article “Play By The Rules”.

Here’s a snippet:

Yo’ a** don’t throw a baseball down da field fo’ a 50-yard touchdown n’ sh**. Yo’ a** don’t kick a basketball past a goalie score a point n’ sh**. Yo’ a** don’t drive da wrong way in a Nascar race n’ sh**. If yo’ a** wants to create web pages, yo’ a** need follow da rules, know what I’m sayin’?
content.plain:
After reading a post over at Eric Meyer’s site about the Snoop Dogg Shizzolator, I figured I had to try it out.
It’s been a long time since I’ve seen something as funny as this on the internet (besides Ebaum’s Epilepsy Test). I thought it was so funny, that I saved a “Shizzolated” copy of my article “Play By The Rules”.
Here’s a snippet:
 Yo’ a** don’t throw a baseball down da field fo’ a 50-yard touchdown n’ sh**. Yo’ a** don’t kick a basketball past a goalie score a point n’ sh**. Yo’ a** don’t drive da wrong way in a Nascar race n’ sh**. If yo’ a** wants to create web pages, yo’ a** need follow da rules, know what I’m sayin’?
content.source:
After reading a post over at [Eric Meyer’s site]({{% wayback "http://www.meyerweb.com/eric/thoughts/2003c.html#t20030913" %}}) about the [Snoop Dogg Shizzolator]({{% wayback "http://www.asksnoop.com" %}}), I figured I *had* to try it out.

It’s been a long time since I’ve seen something as funny as this on the internet (besides [Ebaum’s Epilepsy Test]({{% wayback "http://www.ebaumsworld.com/epilepsy.shtml)" %}}). I thought it was so funny, that I saved a [“Shizzolated” copy](/articles/playbytherules-snoop.php) of my article [“Play By The Rules”](/articles/playbytherules.php).

Here’s a snippet:

> Yo’ a\*\* don’t throw a baseball down da field fo’ a 50-yard touchdown n’ sh\*\*. Yo’ a\*\* don’t kick a basketball past a goalie score a point n’ sh\*\*. Yo’ a\*\* don’t drive da wrong way in a Nascar race n’ sh\*\*. If yo’ a\*\* wants to create web pages, yo’ a\*\* need follow da rules, know what I’m sayin’?
